lead_paragraph: Bill Baroni, who is accused of approving the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge, then covering them up, says he was misled by a Port Authority executive.

headline.print_headline: Former Christie Aide Says He Was Duped About Bridge Lane Closings
headline.main: Ex-Christie Aide Says He Was Duped About Bridge Lane Closings

snippet: Bill Baroni, who is accused of approving the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge, then covering them up, says he was misled by a Port Authority executive....
abstract: Bill Baroni, former official in administration of New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, testifies in George Washington Bridge scandal trial that he had been duped into believing lane closings were part of routine traffic study by Port Authority executive David Wildstein; Wildstein holds Baroni was actively involved in scheme.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
